item.title: CNCJ Meetups
item.description: Cloud Native Computing Johannesburg (CNCJ) 2023 An Introduction to Kubeflow, the MLOps Platform on Kubernetes Fri, 29 September, 6:00PM Online Webinar CNCF event link Optimizing Network Costs in Kubernetes Wed, 26 July, 6:00PM Online Webinar CNCF event link Synthetic Testing with Canary Checker Thu, 25 May, 6:00PM Online Webinar CNCF event link 2022 Scaling Kubernetes with Karpenter: Advanced Scheduling with Pod Affinity Thu, 25 August, 6:00PM Online Webinar CNCF event link Cloud-native machine learning: Kubeflow success stories Wed, 29 June, 6:00PM Online Panel Discussion meetup event link External Secrets Operator: A Cloud Native way to manage your secrets Wed, 25 May, 6:00PM Online Webinar CNCF event link 2021 Transforming into a zero-bug super developer on Kubernetes Wed, 28 July, 6:00PM Online Webinar meetup event link How to think Cloud Native for your next Data project?

item.title: Events
item.description: 2024 Unlock the Power of Gen AI for Fintech with AWS 3 April 2024 Host: AWS Webinar Recordings Over 70% of businesses see GenAI as a growth opportunity but view it as a confusing and risky gamble. We’ve spoken to numerous businesses and developers, and the sentiment is clearâ€”it feels overwhelming. In this webinar, you will learn: Overview of AWS Services in Gen AI High Impact Gen AI Use Cases in FinTech Gen AI Use Case Considerations Transforming Businesses using AI 27 March 2024
